ValidationRule.description: Created as part of CR CR00030892
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISPICKVAL(Gate__c , 'Opportunity') || ISPICKVAL(Gate__c ,'Value Prioritization') || (ISPICKVAL(Gate__c ,'Execute') && ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,'PENDING'))|| (ISPICKVAL(Gate__c ,'Execute') && ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,'IN PROGRESS')) || ISPICKVAL(Gate__c ,'Value Realization'))&& ( ISNULL( IT_Skillsets__c ) || ISBLANK(IT_Skillsets__c ))
